16-year-old.context: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball.

male.context: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball.

left nasal obstruction.context: He has a left nasal obstruction and depressed left nasal bone.

depressed left nasal bone.context: He has a left nasal obstruction and depressed left nasal bone.

Nasal fracture.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

deviated nasal septum.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

obstruction.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasa.context: Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasal septoplasty.

Betadine soap and solution.context: The face was prepped with Betadine soap and solution and draped in a sterile fashion.

Afrin pledgets.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

Xylocaine.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

epinephrine.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

caudal cartilaginous septum.context: Inspection revealed caudal portion of the cartilaginous septum lying crosswise across the nasal spine area and columella causing obstruction of the left nasal valve.

columella.context: Inspection revealed caudal portion of the cartilaginous septum lying crosswise across the nasal spine area and columella causing obstruction of the left nasal valve.

left nasal valve.context: Inspection revealed caudal portion of the cartilaginous septum lying crosswise across the nasal spine area and columella causing obstruction of the left nasal valve.

maxillary crest.context: Further up, the cartilaginous septum was displaced to the left of the maxillary crest. There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

vomer bone.context: Further up, the cartilaginous septum was displaced to the left of the maxillary crest. There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

inferior turbinate.context: Further up, the cartilaginous septum was displaced to the left of the maxillary crest. There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

hemitransfixion incision.context: A left hemitransfixion incision was made.

mucoperichondrium.context: Mucoperichondrium was elevated from left side of the cartilaginous septum and mucoperiosteum was elevated from the ethmoid plate.

vomer.context: Vomer and inferior tunnel was created at the floor of the left side of the nose to connect the anterior and inferior tunnels, which was rather difficult at the area of the vomerine spur, which was very sharp and touching the inferior turbinate.

catgut suture.context: The caudal cartilaginous septum, which was lying crosswise, was separated from the main cartilage leaving approximately 1 cm strut. The right side mucoperichondrium was released from the cartilaginous septum as well as ethmoid plate and the maxillary crest area. The caudal cartilaginous strut was sutured to the columella with interrupted #4-0 chromic catgut suture to bring it into the midline.

plain catgut sutures.context: Further back, the cartilaginous septum anterior to the ethmoid plate was deviated to the left side, so it was freed from the maxillary crest, nasal dorsum, from the ethmoid plate, and was sutured in the midline with a transfixion #4-0 plain catgut sutures.

Jansen-Middleton punch forceps.context: Further posteriorly, the ethmoid plate was deviated to the left side and portion of it was removed with Jansen-Middleton punch forceps.

gouge.context: This area was freed from the perichondrium on both sides. The maxillary crest was removed with a gouge. Vomer was partially removed with a gouge and the rest of the vomer was displaced back into the midline.

chromic catgut sutures.context: Left hemitransfixion incisions were closed with interrupted #4-0 chromic catgut sutures. The septum was also filtered with #4-0 plain catgut sutures.

transfixion #5-0 nylon suture.context: septal splints were tied to the septum bilaterally with a transfixion #5-0 nylon suture.

nasal bone elevator.context: The left intercartilaginous incision was made and the nasal bones were disimpacted subperiosteally and they were molded back into the midline.

Steri-Strips.context: Steri-Strips were applied to the nasal dorsal skin and a Denver type of splint was applied to the nasal dorsal to stabilize the nasal bones.

Denver type of splint.context: Steri-Strips were applied to the nasal dorsal skin and a Denver type of splint was applied to the nasal dorsal to stabilize the nasal bones.

Telfa gauze.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.

bacitracin ointment.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.
